title: The Morgue Australia ^TMA^ - OCE - Building a friendly chatroom - NO TOXIC PLAYERS WELCOME
body:
The Morgue Australia is a company based in melbourne specializing in HEAVY METAL PROMOTIONS and EVENTS .. we all like to play games and noticed the lack of a public chatroom in LOL so we have set out to make our own... NO TOXIC PLAYERS.. abusive players will be kicked... we have ranked members who are happy to help with your queries

NOOBS WELCOME

WE USE DISCORD VOICE CHAT

Owner - ChrisCoroner
Officers - Pabzilla, Dominus Killer, Gryffindor, Kilabe

Cheers
Coroner

replies.body: Can I join? I'm a noob.
Send an invite?? please and thanks.
